description: 用于让用户在不同的视图中进行切换。为优化移动端渲染性能，如有替换DOM、发请求更新数据等操作，请在`onAfterChange`而非`onChange`回调中进行。

descriptionTags.en: Used to let the user switch between different views. In order to optimize the rendering performance of the mobile terminal, if you need to replace the DOM, send a request to update data, etc., please do it in the `onAfterChange` instead of the `onChange` callback.
descriptionTags.name: 选项卡

tags.en: Custom classname
Custom stylesheet

tabs.description:
TabBar内容数组，除必填项外也可附加其他数据，建议用 useMemo 包裹
@en Array of TabBar content, additional data can be appended in addition to the required fields
tabs.name: tabs

tags.en: Array of TabBar content, additional data can be appended in addition to the required fields

tabs.descWithTags: TabBar内容数组，除必填项外也可附加其他数据，建议用 useMemo 包裹

tags.en: TabPane content

activeTab.description:
当前活动tab index，传入则为受控
@en Currently active tab index, controlled if inputting value
activeTab.name: activeTab

tags.en: Currently active tab index, controlled if inputting value

activeTab.descWithTags: 当前活动tab index，传入则为受控

defaultActiveTab.description:
初始tab index值
@en initial tab index value
defaultActiveTab.name: defaultActiveTab

tags.en: initial tab index value

disabled.description:
是否禁用切换，包括点击TabBar切换和滑动切换
@en Whether to disable switching, including clicking TabBar switching and sliding switching
disabled.name: disabled

tags.en: Whether to disable switching, including clicking TabBar switching and sliding switching

disabled.descWithTags: 是否禁用切换，包括点击TabBar切换和滑动切换

tags.en: Tabbar position

tabBarArrange.description:
TabBar排列方式，tabBar在top或bottom位置时有效，start为靠左，center为居中，end为靠右
@en Tabbar arrangement, tabBar is valid when it is in the top or bottom position, start is left, center is centered, and end is right
tabBarArrange.name: tabBarArrange

tags.en: Tabbar arrangement, tabBar is valid when it is in the top or bottom position, start is left, center is centered, and end is right

tabBarArrange.descWithTags: TabBar排列方式，tabBar在top或bottom位置时有效，start为靠左，center为居中，end为靠右

tabBarScroll.description:
是否TabBar超出屏幕时靠左滚动排列
@en Whether to scroll to the left when the TabBar exceeds the screen
tabBarScroll.name: tabBarScroll

tags.en: Whether to scroll to the left when the TabBar exceeds the screen

tabBarScroll.descWithTags: 是否TabBar超出屏幕时靠左滚动排列

tabBarFixed.description:
TabBar是否顶部固定
@en Whether the TabBar is fixed on the top
tabBarFixed.name: tabBarFixed

tags.en: Whether the TabBar is fixed on the top

tabBarExtra.description:
tabBar额外渲染内容
@en TabBar extra render content
tabBarExtra.name: tabBarExtra

tags.en: TabBar extra render content

tabBarScrollBezier.description:
tabBar滚动时变化的bezier曲线值
@en The bezier curve value that changes when the tabBar is scrolled
tabBarScrollBezier.name: tabBarScrollBezier

tags.en: The bezier curve value that changes when the tabBar is scrolled

tabBarScrollDuration.description:
tabBar滚动过渡时长，单位ms
@en TabBar scrolling transition duration, in ms
tabBarScrollDuration.name: tabBarScrollDuration

tags.en: TabBar scrolling transition duration, in ms

tabBarScrollChance.description:
tabBar滚动时机，`jump`表示在跳转tab时，`after-jump`表示跳转动画执行后，`none`表示切换tab后不自动滚动
@en TabBar scrolling timing, `jump` means when the tab is jumped, `after-jump` means after the jump animation is executed, `none` means do not scroll automatically after switching tabs
tabBarScrollChance.name: tabBarScrollChance

tags.en: TabBar scrolling timing, `jump` means when the tab is jumped, `after-jump` means after the jump animation is executed, `none` means do not scroll automatically after switching tabs

tabBarScrollChance.descWithTags: tabBar滚动时机，`jump`表示在跳转tab时，`after-jump`表示跳转动画执行后，`none`表示切换tab后不自动滚动

tabBarHasDivider.description:
tabBar是否有分割线
@en Whether the tabBar has a dividing line
tabBarHasDivider.name: tabBarHasDivider

tags.en: Whether the tabBar has a dividing line

tabBarResetWhenScroll.description:
在竖向滚动tabPane时，自动重设tabBar滚动位置的时机
@en When scrolling the tabPane vertically, the timing of automatically resetting the scroll position of the tabBar
tabBarResetWhenScroll.name: tabBarResetWhenScroll

tags.en: When scrolling the tabPane vertically, the timing of automatically resetting the scroll position of the tabBar

tabBarResetWhenScroll.descWithTags: 在竖向滚动tabPane时，自动重设tabBar滚动位置的时机

type.description:
页签的样式，line为顺次排布，line-divide为等分间距排布，card为分段器式排布
@en The style of the tabs, line is arranged in sequence, line-divide is arranged at equal intervals, and card is arranged by segmenter
type.name: type

tags.en: The style of the tabs, line is arranged in sequence, line-divide is arranged at equal intervals, and card is arranged by segmenter

type.descWithTags: 页签的样式，line为顺次排布，line-divide为等分间距排布，card为分段器式排布

swipeable.description:
是否允许滑动
@en Whether to allow sliding
swipeable.name: swipeable

tags.en: Whether to allow sliding

duration.description:
TabBar下划线滑动动画切换时间，单位ms
@en The time of the TabBar underline sliding animation switching, in ms
duration.name: duration

tags.en: The time of the TabBar underline sliding animation switching, in ms

duration.descWithTags: TabBar下划线滑动动画切换时间，单位ms

fullScreen.description:
是否为全屏(100%)布局
@en Whether the layout is full screen (100%)
fullScreen.name: fullScreen

tags.en: Whether the layout is full screen (100%)

autoHeight.description:
容器高度自适应，仅在mode=swipe且是垂直布局时生效
@en Whether the container height is adaptive, it only takes effect when mode=swipe and vertical layout
autoHeight.name: autoHeight

tags.en: Whether the container height is adaptive, it only takes effect when mode=swipe and vertical layout

autoHeight.descWithTags: 容器高度自适应，仅在mode=swipe且是垂直布局时生效

transitionDuration.description:
swipe模式下表示手指抬起后到动画结束时间，scroll模式下表示点击tab后滚动过渡时间，单位ms
@en In swipe mode, it means the time from when the finger is lifted to the end of the animation. In scroll mode, it means the scroll transition time after clicking the tab, in ms
transitionDuration.name: transitionDuration

tags.en: In swipe mode, it means the time from when the finger is lifted to the end of the animation. In scroll mode, it means the scroll transition time after clicking the tab, in ms

transitionDuration.descWithTags: swipe模式下表示手指抬起后到动画结束时间，scroll模式下表示点击tab后滚动过渡时间，单位ms

useCaterpillar.description:
是否使用毛毛虫效果
@en Whether to use the caterpillar effect
useCaterpillar.name: useCaterpillar

tags.en: Whether to use the caterpillar effect

caterpillarProperty.description:
使用毛毛虫效果时，执行动画更改的属性，`scale`表示更改 transform: scale 值，`size`表示更改宽高值。一般在避免border-radius被scale拉伸的情况会使用`size`，但需注意其性能不如`scale`
@en When using the caterpillar effect, the properties that perform animation changes, `scale` means changing the transform: scale value, `size` means changing the width and height values. Generally, `size` is used to avoid border-radius being stretched by scale, but it should be noted that its performance is not as good as `scale`
caterpillarProperty.name: caterpillarProperty

tags.en: When using the caterpillar effect, the properties that perform animation changes, `scale` means changing the transform: scale value, `size` means changing the width and height values. Generally, `size` is used to avoid border-radius being stretched by scale, but it should be noted that its performance is not as good as `scale`

caterpillarProperty.descWithTags: 使用毛毛虫效果时，执行动画更改的属性，`scale`表示更改 transform: scale 值，`size`表示更改宽高值。一般在避免border-radius被scale拉伸的情况会使用`size`，但需注意其性能不如`scale`

caterpillarMaxScale.description:
毛毛虫效果开启时，TabBar下划线最长延展倍数（相对于自身长度）
@en When the caterpillar effect is enabled, the longest extension multiple of the TabBar underline (relative to its own length)
caterpillarMaxScale.name: caterpillarMaxScale

tags.en: When the caterpillar effect is enabled, the longest extension multiple of the TabBar underline (relative to its own length)

caterpillarMaxScale.descWithTags: 毛毛虫效果开启时，TabBar下划线最长延展倍数（相对于自身长度）

percentToChangeTab.description:
滑动切换距离阈值(宽度比例)，范围为[0, 1]，如果该属性和`distanceToChangeTab`属性均设置，则实际计算结果更大的生效
@en Sliding switching distance threshold (width ratio), the range is [0, 1]. If this property and the `distanceToChangeTab` property are both set, the larger actual calculation result will take effect
percentToChangeTab.name: percentToChangeTab

tags.en: Sliding switching distance threshold (width ratio), the range is [0, 1]. If this property and the `distanceToChangeTab` property are both set, the larger actual calculation result will take effect

percentToChangeTab.descWithTags: 滑动切换距离阈值(宽度比例)，范围为[0, 1]，如果该属性和`distanceToChangeTab`属性均设置，则实际计算结果更大的生效

distanceToChangeTab.description:
滑动切换距离阈值(固定px宽度)，如果该属性和`percentToChangeTab`属性均设置，则实际计算结果更大的生效
@en The sliding switching distance threshold (fixed px width), if both this property and the `percentToChangeTab` property are set, the actual calculation result will take effect with a larger one
distanceToChangeTab.name: distanceToChangeTab

tags.en: The sliding switching distance threshold (fixed px width), if both this property and the `percentToChangeTab` property are set, the actual calculation result will take effect with a larger one

distanceToChangeTab.descWithTags: 滑动切换距离阈值(固定px宽度)，如果该属性和`percentToChangeTab`属性均设置，则实际计算结果更大的生效

speedToChangeTab.description:
滑动切换速度阈值(手指从按下到抬起之间的滑动速度，单位为px/s)，与滑动切换距离阈值同时设置时，满足其中一个即生效
@en The sliding switching speed threshold (the sliding speed of the finger from pressing to lifting, in px/s), when it is set at the same time as the sliding switching distance threshold, it will take effect if one of them is satisfied.
speedToChangeTab.name: speedToChangeTab

tags.en: The sliding switching speed threshold (the sliding speed of the finger from pressing to lifting, in px/s), when it is set at the same time as the sliding switching distance threshold, it will take effect if one of them is satisfied.

speedToChangeTab.descWithTags: 滑动切换速度阈值(手指从按下到抬起之间的滑动速度，单位为px/s)，与滑动切换距离阈值同时设置时，满足其中一个即生效

disableClickTransition.description:
点击tab切换时禁用动画
@en Disable animation when tab switch is clicked
disableClickTransition.name: disableClickTransition

tags.en: Disable animation when tab switch is clicked

lazyloadCount.description:
只加载当前页相邻的n个内容，为0时会隐藏/销毁所有相邻内容，不传则加载所有内容，在mode=swipe时生效
@en Only load the n content adjacent to the current page. When it is 0, all adjacent content will be hidden/destroyed. If not input, all content will be loaded. It will take effect when mode=swipe
lazyloadCount.name: lazyloadCount

tags.en: Only load the n content adjacent to the current page. When it is 0, all adjacent content will be hidden/destroyed. If not input, all content will be loaded. It will take effect when mode=swipe

lazyloadCount.descWithTags: 只加载当前页相邻的n个内容，为0时会隐藏/销毁所有相邻内容，不传则加载所有内容，在mode=swipe时生效

hideContentStyle.description:
当开启懒加载时，针对不在懒加载范围内的内容设置样式，传入null则销毁内容
@en When lazy loading is enabled, set the style for the content that is not within the scope of lazy loading, and pass in null to destroy the content
hideContentStyle.name: hideContentStyle

tags.en: When lazy loading is enabled, set the style for the content that is not within the scope of lazy loading, and pass in null to destroy the content

hideContentStyle.descWithTags: 当开启懒加载时，针对不在懒加载范围内的内容设置样式，传入null则销毁内容

renderHideContent.description:
自行渲染不在懒加载范围内的pane，其中参数pane代表第index个tab原本要渲染的内容
@en Render the pane that is not within the scope of lazy loading by itself, where the parameter pane represents the content to be rendered by the index-th tab
renderHideContent.name: renderHideContent

tags.en: Render the pane that is not within the scope of lazy loading by itself, where the parameter pane represents the content to be rendered by the index-th tab

renderHideContent.descWithTags: 自行渲染不在懒加载范围内的pane，其中参数pane代表第index个tab原本要渲染的内容

hideTabBarBeforeMounted.description:
在组件加载完成前是否隐藏TabBar，防止溢出时多余的滚动效果
@en Whether to hide the TabBar before the component is loaded to prevent redundant scrolling effects when overflowing
hideTabBarBeforeMounted.name: hideTabBarBeforeMounted

tags.en: Whether to hide the TabBar before the component is loaded to prevent redundant scrolling effects when overflowing

hideTabBarBeforeMounted.descWithTags: 在组件加载完成前是否隐藏TabBar，防止溢出时多余的滚动效果

overflowThreshold.description:
TabBar个数大于等于多少时认为会溢出，用于dom加载完成之前的ssr首屏渲染优化
@en When the number of TabBars is greater than or equal to the number of TabBars, it is considered to overflow, which is used for ssr first screen rendering optimization before dom loading is completed
overflowThreshold.name: overflowThreshold

tags.en: When the number of TabBars is greater than or equal to the number of TabBars, it is considered to overflow, which is used for ssr first screen rendering optimization before dom loading is completed

overflowThreshold.descWithTags: TabBar个数大于等于多少时认为会溢出，用于dom加载完成之前的ssr首屏渲染优化

showUnderline.description:
是否展示下划线
@en Whether to display underline
showUnderline.name: showUnderline

tags.en: Whether to display underline

underlineAdaptive.description:
下划线是否根据 tab cell 长度自适应
@en Whether the underline is adaptive according to the length of the tab cell
underlineAdaptive.name: underlineAdaptive

tags.en: Whether the underline is adaptive according to the length of the tab cell

underlineAdaptive.descWithTags: 下划线是否根据 tab cell 长度自适应

stopTouchThreshold.description:
触发onTouchStopped的最小阈值
@en Minimum threshold to trigger onTouchStopped
stopTouchThreshold.name: stopTouchThreshold

tags.en: Minimum threshold to trigger onTouchStopped

touchSideDisableThreshold.description:
距离屏幕边缘多远开始向右滑动时禁用tabs滑动事件
@en The distance from the edge of the screen to disable the tabs swipe event when you start swiping right
touchSideDisableThreshold.name: touchSideDisableThreshold

tags.en: The distance from the edge of the screen to disable the tabs swipe event when you start swiping right

touchSideDisableThreshold.descWithTags: 距离屏幕边缘多远开始向右滑动时禁用tabs滑动事件

stopPropagation.description:
swipe 模式下，触摸事件是否需要 stopPropagation
@en In swipe mode, whether the touch event need stopPropagation
stopPropagation.name: stopPropagation

tags.en: In swipe mode, whether the touch event need stopPropagation

stopPropagation.descWithTags: swipe 模式下，触摸事件是否需要 stopPropagation

getInnerScrollContainer.description:
swipe 模式下，组件内部的滚动容器，用于豁免滑动事件响应
@en In swipe mode, the scroll container inside the component is used to exempt the swipe event response
getInnerScrollContainer.name: getInnerScrollContainer

tags.en: In swipe mode, the scroll container inside the component is used to exempt the swipe event response

getInnerScrollContainer.descWithTags: swipe 模式下，组件内部的滚动容器，用于豁免滑动事件响应

mode.description:
tabs切换模式，swipe为滑动模式，scroll为滚动监听模式
@en Tabs switching mode, swipe is sliding mode, scroll is scroll listening mode
mode.name: mode

tags.en: Tabs switching mode, swipe is sliding mode, scroll is scroll listening mode

mode.descWithTags: tabs切换模式，swipe为滑动模式，scroll为滚动监听模式

getScrollContainer.description:
滚动模式下的滚动容器，用于监听滚动事件，mode=scroll 时有效
@en The scroll container in scroll mode, used to listen to scroll events, valid when mode=scroll
getScrollContainer.name: getScrollContainer

tags.en: The scroll container in scroll mode, used to listen to scroll events, valid when mode=scroll

getScrollContainer.descWithTags: 滚动模式下的滚动容器，用于监听滚动事件，mode=scroll 时有效

scrollThrottle.description:
滚动模式下的节流粒度，mode=scroll 时有效
@en Throttling granularity in scroll mode, valid when mode=scroll
scrollThrottle.name: scrollThrottle

tags.en: Throttling granularity in scroll mode, valid when mode=scroll

scrollThrottle.descWithTags: 滚动模式下的节流粒度，mode=scroll 时有效

scrollOffset.description:
滚动模式下判断tab切换的偏移量，正数为向下偏移，负数为向上偏移，mode=scroll 时有效
@en Determine the offset of tab switching in scroll mode, a positive number is a downward offset, a negative number is an upward offset, valid when mode=scroll
scrollOffset.name: scrollOffset

tags.en: Determine the offset of tab switching in scroll mode, a positive number is a downward offset, a negative number is an upward offset, valid when mode=scroll

scrollOffset.descWithTags: 滚动模式下判断tab切换的偏移量，正数为向下偏移，负数为向上偏移，mode=scroll 时有效

defaultValue.value: 当初始index不为0时会自动滚动，为0时则不会自动滚动

scrollWhenMounted.name: scrollWhenMounted

tags.en: In scroll mode, whether to automatically scroll to the currently selected position when the component is initially loaded, valid when mode=scroll
tags.default: 当初始index不为0时会自动滚动，为0时则不会自动滚动
tags.default_en: When the initial index is not 0, it will scroll automatically, when it is 0, it will not scroll automatically

scrollWhenMounted.descWithTags: 滚动模式下，在组件初始加载时是否需要自动滚动到当前所选位置，mode=scroll 时有效

goLastWhenScrollBottom.description:
当滚动到最底部时，如果最后一个pane尚未到达底部，是否强行选中，mode=scroll 时有效
@en When scrolling to the bottom, if the last pane has not reached the bottom, whether to force the selection, valid when mode=scroll
goLastWhenScrollBottom.name: goLastWhenScrollBottom

tags.en: When scrolling to the bottom, if the last pane has not reached the bottom, whether to force the selection, valid when mode=scroll

goLastWhenScrollBottom.descWithTags: 当滚动到最底部时，如果最后一个pane尚未到达底部，是否强行选中，mode=scroll 时有效

scrollVertical.description:
是否监听垂直方向的滚动，否则监听水平方向滚动
@en Whether to monitor vertical scrolling, otherwise monitor horizontal scrolling
scrollVertical.name: scrollVertical

tags.en: Whether to monitor vertical scrolling, otherwise monitor horizontal scrolling

scrollVertical.descWithTags: 是否监听垂直方向的滚动，否则监听水平方向滚动

tabBarClass.description:
TabBar外层容器自定义类名

tabPaneClass.description:
TabPane外层容器自定义类名
@en Custom classname of TabPane outer container

TabBar外层容器自定义样式
@en Custom style of TabBar outer container

tags.en: Custom style of TabBar outer container

tabPaneStyle.description:
TabPane外层容器自定义样式
@en Custom style of TabPane outer container
tabPaneStyle.name: tabPaneStyle

tags.en: Custom style of TabPane outer container

tabPaneExtra.description:
TabPane额外渲染元素，需绝对定位
@en Extra rendering elements of TabPane, which shoule be absolute positioning
tabPaneExtra.name: tabPaneExtra

tags.en: Extra rendering elements of TabPane, which shoule be absolute positioning

translateZ.description:
TabPane和TabBar开启translateZ
@en Whether TabPane and TabBar open translateZ
translateZ.name: translateZ

tags.en: Whether TabPane and TabBar open translateZ

swipeEnergySaving.description:
是否启用滑动节能模式，开启后TabPane外层容器不会随panes数量撑开并提升为合成层，仅滑动当前选中的pane，其他pane在选中前将被隐藏
@en Whether to enable the energy-saving sliding mode. After opening, the outer container of the TabPane will not expand with the number of panes and be promoted to a composite layer. Only the currently selected pane will be slid, and other panes will be hidden before being selected.
swipeEnergySaving.name: swipeEnergySaving

tags.en: Whether to enable the energy-saving sliding mode. After opening, the outer container of the TabPane will not expand with the number of panes and be promoted to a composite layer. Only the currently selected pane will be slid, and other panes will be hidden before being selected.

swipeEnergySaving.descWithTags: 是否启用滑动节能模式，开启后TabPane外层容器不会随panes数量撑开并提升为合成层，仅滑动当前选中的pane，其他pane在选中前将被隐藏

onTouchStopped.description:
当滑到第一页或最后一页，还想再滑动时触发
@en Triggered when swiping to the first or last page and want to swipe again

tags.en: Triggered when swiping to the first or last page and want to swipe again

TabBar在溢出滚动时回调

是否使用毛毛虫效果

caterpillarProperty.name: caterpillarProperty
caterpillarProperty.description:
使用毛毛虫效果时，执行动画更改的属性，`scale`表示更改 transform: scale 值，`size`表示更改宽高值。一般在避免border-radius被scale拉伸的情况会使用`size`，但需注意其性能不如`scale`
@en When using the caterpillar effect, the properties that perform animation changes, `scale` means changing the transform: scale value, `size` means changing the width and height values. Generally, `size` is used to avoid border-radius being stretched by scale, but it should be noted that its performance is not as good as `scale`

tags.en: When using the caterpillar effect, the properties that perform animation changes, `scale` means changing the transform: scale value, `size` means changing the width and height values. Generally, `size` is used to avoid border-radius being stretched by scale, but it should be noted that its performance is not as good as `scale`

caterpillarProperty.descWithTags: 使用毛毛虫效果时，执行动画更改的属性，`scale`表示更改 transform: scale 值，`size`表示更改宽高值。一般在避免border-radius被scale拉伸的情况会使用`size`，但需注意其性能不如`scale`
